transcript:
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan ji Kamlesh ji good morning sir bol raha hun.
Customer: Haan, good morning boliye na.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha senior marketing.
Customer: Achha haan haan boliye dekhiye kitna din se IndiaMART wala jo kya kya nahi bole are main ki na abhi frustrate hai ekdam ek to sala business nahi ho raha dusra kahin kaam pe gaye hain wahan par itna call aata hai IndiaMART ka na jo bina matlab ka lagta hai ki kya hum gaye.
Executive: Aur boliye sir kya.
Customer: Badhiya sir aap bataye kaam kaisa chal raha hai sir yahan pe kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hum to chhod diye aapko dikh rahe honge consume karna bhi chhod diye matlab ki kya jarurat hai consume karne ka jab ho hi nahi raha business to.
Customer: Daily ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir abhi aapne kareeban 7 5:30 baje ke aas pass kitne catalog open karke use kiya hai use to daily ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to catalog maine wo dekha na ki consume mera left hua ki hua wo mera dekhna tha kya ki hum usi catalog bhi hua utna shock nahi hai catalog use.
Executive: Sir dekhiye use aise hai ki aap agar use nahi karenge hume batayenge nahi to hum to usko kaam fir kaise karenge.
Customer: Sir kaam aapke hath mein system hai aapko kaam karna hai lo system hai kaam karna hai.
Executive: Abhi jaise aap mujhe bataye aap Jharkhand se hain theek hai Dumri se theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Jharkhand jile mein sir kareeban aap dekhenge log shahar bhi kafi sare hain aapka Dhanbad ho gaya.
Customer: Dekhiye wahan hum akele hain Dumri mein akele hain lekin fir bhi mera business humko nahi milta to kya karein kisko aap request karein.
Executive: Aap wagaire mein aap Ranchi wagaire mein agar aap kare sir dekhna uske baad aap Ranchi mein utha rahe hain theek hai.
Customer: Ek bar bol kar.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: Dipanshu ko bula lo.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

summary:
Concerns:

- Business is not happening through IndiaMART.

- Receiving irrelevant calls from IndiaMART.

- Stopped consuming due to lack of business.

- Catalog views are not effective.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about the issues faced.

- Executive mentioned about catalog usage.

- Executive suggested focusing on Ranchi area.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive put the call on hold.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, business, calls
